lines.text: I will not be beaten by children.
A reporter in league with terrorists is a dangerous enemy.
Everything's different, even if it looks the same.

The important things haven't changed. There's still the same painted blue sky and and artificial trees. white birds on a brilliant rainbow purified water on man-made flowers the orange sun filtered through acid-free air,warming our beautiful world. These things haven't changed...
But what else do you see?
Hiro! Gimme a hand! Help me with the bag!
The sky could fall and women could still go shopping.
What a stupid thing to say.
I just bought food for a few weeks, that's plain common sense if you ask me.
You'll make some lucky man a lovely wife.
Very funny.
Well, we just about got it all in.
Your car is pretty sporty, but not practical.
Tell Rob what ya think of it. It's his car.
Hmmm, Rob's car? Don't you have one?
[Hiro starts driving fast]
Hey take it easy! if you attract attention, he might fire at us! There are soldiers everywhere! They're flagging us down, better pull over.
Identification?
I'm not carrying it.
Well that's real stupid.
Here you are!
